amendment.description: An amendment numbered 87 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds to finalize the Federal Labor Relations Authority's proposed rule entitled "Miscellaneous and General Requirements" (87 Fed. Reg. 78014) which would restrict federal employees' ability to opt out of membership in a labor union.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 223 (Roll no. 637).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 223 (Roll no. 637).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
